content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (-16.5, -48.5), (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -48.5), and (-13.5, -49.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnaces at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserters at positions (-11.5, -49.5), (-10.5, -49.5), and (-8.5, -49.5)
- Iron Chest at position (-14.5, -47.5) for storing iron plates and iron gear wheels

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Iron Chests at positions (41.5, -80.5), (42.5, -80.5), (44.5, -80.5), and (45.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserters at positions (43.5, -80.5) and (41.5, -78.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract from non-existent or full chests
- Ensure the target chest exists and contains the expected items before attempting to extract.

### Errors when supplying furnaces with insufficient inventory
- Check inventory levels to ensure there are enough resources available before attempting to supply furnaces.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
